Key Match Events: The Utah Jazz kept the game close but ultimately came up short in a 114-106 loss to the Phoenix Suns.
Lauri Markkanen led the way for Utah with 24 points, Collin Sexton and Walker Kessler contributed with 20 and 16 points respectively.
The Jazz trimmed the Suns' lead to as few as one point in the third quarter but couldn't maintain the momentum.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Jazz had a slow start but showed resilience throughout the game.
Rookies like Elijah Harkless and Cody Williams made significant contributions.
The game was marked by solid defensive efforts and key offensive plays.
Others: The Jazz had several players on the injury report, including Johnny Juzang, Brice Sensabaugh, Jordan Clarkson, John Collins, and Keyonte George.
